special_text:
Recipe [i](Exile this as it resolves with a cooking counter on it. Then you may put an “I”, “II”, and “III” ingredient you own in exile with cooking counters on them onto the battlefield merged as a Saga enchantment with their names, colors, and chapter abilities.)[/i]
[level 1] Create an X/X red Elemental creature token with trample, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards you own in exile and in your graveyard.
notes:
New card — Replaced Surface Monitor

Given that the red common big creature recipe became a 4-power hasty creature, I figured changing Surface Monitor to be more distinct was a good idea
